title: Condors: Giant Birds
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,436 words, Level Y (Grade 5), Lexile 1090L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     H and S
description: Condors: Giant Birds covers many interesting facts about these graceful flyers. From condors' eating habits to their near extinction, students will enjoy reading about these amazing creatures. Vibrant pictures and maps enhance the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
